overview:
Bob is a tech entrepreneur at heart. He left the corporate world (Polaroid Corporation and CVS/Caremark) several years ago to create companies from the ground up. He has either founded, advised or been a member of the senior marketing or executive teams of: Cambridge Interactive (acquired by the Principality of Monaco), WorkshopLive (National Guitar Workshop), FreeCause Loyalty (acquired by Rakuten Media Group), Commission Junction (acquired by ValueClick Media) and Lids Corporation (acquired by Hat World).

Bob currently advises several internet start-ups within the MIT community in Cambridge, MA.

image.attribution: Robert Land / The Knavery
